article_title: Residents push for better health care coverage for amputees
article_text:
Some Long Island residents are asking lawmakers to change a policy that is preventing thousands of amputees from receiving the prosthetic devices they need.

Dan Bastian, owner of Progressive Orthotics & Prosthetics, has been fitting patients with prosthetic arms and legs since losing his leg to cancer. He says he recently discovered the Affordable Care Act only covers one prosthetic for...
